item.title: Eric add a quote by george lucas
item.description: "May the Force be with you." -- george lucas

item.title: Eric add a quote by George Lucas
item.description: "So this is how liberty dies. With thunderous applause." -- George Lucas

item.title: Eric add a quote by George Lucas
item.description: "Always remember, your focus determines your reality." -- George Lucas

item.title: Eric add a quote by George Lucas
item.description: "The ability to speak does not make you intelligent." -- George Lucas

item.title: Eric add a quote by George Lucas
item.description: "Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering." -- George Lucas

item.title: Eric add a quote by George Lucas
item.description: "Once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny, consume you it will..." -- George Lucas

item.title: Eric add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "Teenage girls, please don’t worry about being super popular in high school, or being the best actress in high school, or the best athlete. Not only do people not care about any of that the second you graduate, but when you get older, if you reference your successes in high school too much, it actually makes you look kind of pitiful, like some babbling old Tennessee Williams character with nothing else going on in her current life. What I’ve noticed is that almost no one who was a big star in high school is also big star later in life. For us overlooked kids, it’s so wonderfully fair." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Eric add a quote by Dante Alighieri
item.description: "In that book which is my memory, On the first page of the chapter that is the day when I first met you, Appear the words, ‘Here begins a new life’." -- Dante Alighieri
